style.lighting: Bright, cheerful, warm sunlight with soft shadows
style.texture: Smooth cartoon shading with subtle highlights

bookCover.theme: Championship sports stadium with cartoon characters and fun educational elements
bookCover.prompt: Create a vibrant, fun Pixar-style 3D cartoon book cover for 'Perfect Effort: Winning at the Game of Life'. The scene shows a diverse group of excited cartoon middle/high school students in a colorful championship stadium. They're celebrating achievements with trophies, medals, and sports equipment floating around them. The stadium has bright blue and gold colors, cheerful lighting, and an inspiring atmosphere. Style: Pixar/Disney 3D animation quality, cartoon realism, fun but sophisticated, educational energy. Clean space at top for title. No text in image. Appeals to teens ages 12-18.

unifiedTheme.setting: Colorful cartoon championship stadium/arena with Pixar-style quality
unifiedTheme.lighting: Bright, warm, cheerful lighting with soft cartoon shadows
unifiedTheme.floor: Glossy, reflective cartoon arena floor with fun blue-gold patterns
unifiedTheme.background: Soft-focused cartoon stadium with diverse excited spectator silhouettes

colorPalette.pops: Playful pinks, purples, greens for variety (#EC4899, #A855F7, #10B981)

unifiedTheme.style: Pixar/Disney-quality 3D cartoon realism - fun, approachable, educational
unifiedTheme.perspective: Dynamic, slightly elevated camera angle (15-25 degrees)
unifiedTheme.composition: Centered main element with depth, rule of thirds balance
unifiedTheme.depthOfField: Sharp, colorful foreground; soft, fun background

01.title: Life is a Sport
01.mainElement: Cartoon sports equipment (basketball, soccer ball, chess pieces, running shoes, game controller) floating and glowing in a fun arrangement. Each item has personality - slight cartoon faces or expressions. Colorful energy trails connect them.

02.title: Know Your Stats
02.mainElement: Holographic cartoon dashboard with fun animated graphs, progress bars, and metrics floating in 3D space. Bright neon blue-gold-purple colors. Friendly UI design with playful icons and numbers that pop.
02.style: Futuristic but fun, like a video game HUD

03.title: The Scoreboard That Matters
03.mainElement: Modern cartoon scoreboard displaying unique success metrics with friendly icons: growth meter, friendship counter, learning streak, happiness gauge. Gold frame, colorful digital displays with fun animations.

04.title: Practice Like a Pro
04.mainElement: Training station with cartoon practice equipment - weights with happy faces, musical instruments with personality, books that glow, all arranged in determined but friendly poses. Shows dedication with a smile.

05.title: Your Inner Coach
05.mainElement: Glowing cartoon character silhouette radiating warm golden inner light. The light forms encouraging symbols (stars, hearts, thumbs up) around them. Ethereal but friendly, like a wise cartoon mentor.

06.title: Losing is Learning
06.mainElement: Cartoon phoenix character rising from playful blue-gold flames, or broken trophy pieces magically reassembling with sparkles. Transformation shown in a hopeful, fun way. Character smiling through the challenge.

07.title: Focus Mode: On
07.mainElement: Giant colorful bullseye target with single glowing arrow dead center. Dramatic but playful spotlight beam. Surrounding area slightly blurred with cartoon motion lines showing intense focus energy.
07.style: Sharp focus with fun energy visualization

08.title: The Pressure Test
08.mainElement: Cartoon diamond forming in glass display case with visible cartoon pressure forces (fun weighted anvils, springs). Blue-gold crystalline structure with sparkles. Shows transformation in a friendly way.
08.style: Dramatic but approachable, educational science vibe

09.title: Morning Warm-Up
09.mainElement: Cheerful sunrise breaking through arena skylight, illuminating cartoon morning items on platform - yoga mat with cute pose figure, colorful healthy breakfast, journal with doodles. Dawn light mixing with arena glow.

10.title: Fuel Your Engine
10.mainElement: Cartoon engine made of vibrant fresh fruits, sparkling water droplets, and glowing energy symbols. Fruits have happy faces, engine parts are colorful and friendly. Blue-gold energy particles flowing.

11.title: The Recovery Room
11.mainElement: Peaceful cartoon recovery zone - comfy meditation cushion with sleepy character, gentle cartoon plants swaying, cozy rest area with soft pillows. Bathed in calm blue glow with floating Zzz's and peaceful symbols.
11.style: Calming but still colorful and friendly

12.title: Time is Your Currency
12.mainElement: Ornate cartoon hourglass where sand is made of golden coins and clock gears. Time pieces have friendly faces showing value. Precious metals shine, blue glass glows. Treasure-like presentation.
12.style: Sophisticated but fun, valuable cartoon treasure

13.title: The Compound Effect
13.mainElement: Cartoon domino chain mid-fall with each domino getting bigger and more colorful, or tiny seed with cartoon face sprouting into magnificent glowing golden tree with happy leaves. Small-to-large progression visual.

14.title: Choose Your Teammates
14.mainElement: Circle of diverse cartoon hands reaching inward forming unified team huddle. Hands glow with blue-gold energy bonds connecting them. Friendship sparkles and high-five energy radiating.

15.title: The Mentor Advantage
15.mainElement: Two cartoon characters - wise mentor and eager student on stepped platform. Mentor illuminating student's path with golden light beam filled with knowledge symbols (books, lightbulbs, stars). Both characters smiling.

16.title: Building Your Support System
16.mainElement: Strong cartoon architectural pillars or glowing network web with friendly connection nodes. Each node shows different support types (family, friends, teachers) with happy icons. Foundation looks solid but fun.
16.style: Strong structure with friendly, connected energy

17.title: Level Up Your Skills
17.mainElement: Ascending cartoon stairway with each level showing skill progression (bronze to silver to gold to platinum). Glowing progression indicators, achievement badges, power-up stars at each level. Video game aesthetic.

18.title: Play Your Position
18.mainElement: Cartoon chess piece (king or queen) perfectly positioned on strategic board with happy confident expression. Or cartoon athlete in ideal stance with determination pose. Finding sweet spot visualization.

19.title: Clutch Moments
19.mainElement: Cartoon basketball frozen at rim mid-swish with energy particles, or cartoon sprinter breaking finish tape with victory explosion of confetti and stars. Peak performance captured in fun moment.

20.title: The Long Game
20.mainElement: Winding cartoon marathon path with friendly mile markers leading from arena floor to distant mountain peak with victory flag. Cartoon character silhouette journeying forward. Path glows blue-gold showing progress.

consistentElements: Vibrant blue-gold-orange color palette with playful accents
Soft cartoon shadows and warm lighting
Friendly, approachable characters or objects with personality
Educational but fun - never childish, always teen-appropriate
Depth of field - sharp colorful foreground, soft background
No text or typography in images
Inspires action while being fun and engaging
qualityChecklist: Cartoon realism - not too childish, not too serious
Fun elements that enhance, not distract
